did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Correspondence, records, memorabilia, video cassettes, and photographs.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes letters to family, certificates and medals, maps, Army records, insignia, receipts, and memorabilia of a helicopter pilot in the Vietnam War.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes letters to family, certificates and medals, maps, Army records, insignia, receipts, and memorabilia of a helicopter pilot in the Vietnam War. Also, videocassette of movies taken in Vietnam and tape recordings sent home during the war; includes family papers and business records, and photographs.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: John V. Breedlove Papers, #7036. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

odd.head: NOTES
odd.p: Part of Vietnam War Veterans Archives.
